text: Which of the following languages are undecidable? Note that (M) indicates encoding of the Turing machine M. + Li={(M) | L(M) = 2} e Ly = {(M,w,q) | M on input w reaches state Â¢ in exactly 100 steps} e L3 = {(M) | L(M) is not recursive} e Ly = {(M) | L(M)contains at least 21 members} A.
